CustomField.formula: IF( OR(Access_Type__c = "Periodic", Access_Type__c = "Monthly"), (DAY(End_date__c) - DAY(Start_date__c) + 1) / DAY( DATE( YEAR(Start_date__c) + IF(MONTH(Start_date__c) = 12, 1, 0), IF(MONTH(Start_date__c) = 12, 1, MONTH(Start_date__c) + 1), 1 ) - 1 ), 1 )
CustomField.label: Monthly Units
